channel.title: How do i make myself admin?
channel.description:
Problem: ok well i dont know how to make myself admin on my own server wat do i havto edit? or change etc and where do i i havto change it....
Server Base: pimpscape

item.title: How do i make myself admin?
item.dc:creator: @green_dude green dude
item.description:
@green_dude wrote:

Ok… … Open your client.JAVA and search for :

start of moderator

You should see this (or something similar) :

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Tilt Pure")) { playerRights = 3; if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("k1ll r4ng3d")) playerRights = 2; }

And etc…Now change :

Tilt    Pure

To your in-game username.Compile,run and you will be admin.
NOTE: you will see

playerRights = ......

… = 1,2 or 3. 1 means moderator(silver crown),2 means a staff moderator(gold crown),3 means admin.

NOTE2: If you dont have the same name in :

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Tilt    Pure"))

it’s ok.Just change the name in :

(""))

with your name.Enjoy.Hope it helped.

-Green Dude

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself admin?

item.title: How do i make myself admin?
item.dc:creator: @biblybob biblybob

@biblybob wrote:

but it dont have search there![br][size=1]Posted at: December 12, 2006, 08:39:41 AM[/size][hr]ok i found it yay![br][size=1]Posted at: December 12, 2006, 08:41:00 AM[/size][hr]ok i found it now wat? it says

[code]//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

/checkmods();ralph2004
checkadmins();ralph2004
checkstaff();
if(checkmods() == 5)
playerRights = 1;
if(checkadmins() == 5)
playerRights = 2;
if(checkstaff() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“kkk”))
playerRights = 3;/

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“kkk”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

			if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod roscoe"))
			{
				playerRights = 1; 
			}[/code]

wat i havto do?

item.title: How do i make myself admin?
item.dc:creator: @iceman21 iceman21
item.description:
@iceman21 wrote:

dude didnt i just tell you.

  1. Open up your client the notepad form
  2. Click edit and the top and then click search.
  3. Type in search “admin list” without the "
  4. Change the name from whatever the first name is to your account name. Since your using a Pimpscape source you should have two names. admin and something else. Just change the admin to your name. =]

Read full topic
